snippet: The French police filed preliminary charges of planning terrorist acts and financing a terrorism enterprise on Tuesday against the administrator of an extremist Islamic Web site.
abstract: French police file preliminary charges of planning terrorist acts and financing a terrorism enterprise against an unnamed man who is administrator of an extremist Islamic Web site; he is suspected of helping to finance terrorist groups and recruit for them.
lead_paragraph: The French police filed preliminary charges of planning terrorist acts and financing a terrorism enterprise on Tuesday against the administrator of an extremist Islamic Web site.

headline.main: France: Web Administrator Charged in Terror Inquiry
headline.print_headline: France: Web Administrator Charged in Terror Inquiry
